features.name: NewAuthFlow
features.description: Enable the new authentication flow with enhanced security features

features.name: EnableMetrics
features.description: Enable OpenTelemetry metrics collection and export

features.name: UseDistributedCache
features.description: Use Redis for distributed caching instead of in-memory cache

features.name: DetailedLogging
features.description: Enable detailed request/response logging for debugging

features.name: ModuleHotReload
features.description: Enable hot reloading of modules during development

features.name: AsyncModuleLoading
features.description: Load modules asynchronously to improve startup performance
